text: Louis Cody Sossamon (June 2, 1921 - February 11, 2019) was an American football center and linebacker. He played three seasons with the New York Yankees professional football team. He played college football at the University of South Carolina. He was a member of the University of South Carolina and South Carolina State Athletic Halls of Fame. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American football centers Category:American football linebackers Category:Sportspeople from South Carolina
title: Lou Sossamon
